text: Pathala Mohini () is a 1965 Kannada language film directed by S. N. Singh. The film stars Vanisree, Prathima Devi, B. M. Venkatesh and Narasimharaju in the lead roles. The film is based on a story of how a faithful wife saves her husband from a haunting ghost of his former lover. ==Cast== * Vanisree as Mohini the Ghost * Prathima Devi as pious wife * B. M. Venkatesh as Husband and former lover of Mohini * Narasimharaju * Balakrishna * M. N. Lakshmi Devi * Eshwarappa ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Rajan-Nagendra, with lyrics by Hunsur Krishnamurthy. ==References== Category:1965 films Category:Indian films Category:1960s Kannada-language films Category:Films scored by Rajan-Nagendra
title: Pathala Mohini
